reviews.review: I absolutely LOVED the first Portal. One of the few games I played all the way to the end….and then I heard the ending credits.  I laughed so hard, I played it again.  This game is even better. I was laughing from the time the game started.  The puzzles are amazing and I just started.  Every level has a way of expanding your problem solving skills and simultaneously making you laugh!!  ANY fan of portals MUST HAVE this game.  Anyone who hasn’t played this, MUST GET this!  I got it on sale and it was a better purchase than the coffee I’m drinking!  Enjoy.

Безумно интересная игра, наш персонаж очнулся, когда всё порушено и разрушено, одним словом портал уже не тот. А проходить его стало ещё труднее, если не руководство в сообществе, то кое где вообще тупанул на 10-15 мин., на одном уровне. Сами, уровни проходить и сложно и трудно, но главное в этой игре фишка - даже не в этом, а сам сюжет и сценарий, ну вы не поверите, проходя игру ощущаете себя прям героем в сьемках фантастичекого фильма. И играя вам просто нужно уже узнать, чем закончится игра.
Рекомендую, как и первую, так и вторую часть игры Портал.
One of the best games I have ever played. I would recommend playing the first Portal before this one, but I can't imagine anyone not liking this game. 10/10

А ещё ты можешь посоревноваться в интеллекте с друзьями, ведь тут есть кооператив. И он также интересен, как и одиночная сюжетная линия. Чего я тут распинаюсь? Это игра хороша, просто сыграйте в неё сами. И всё поймёте.

"Oh... It's you. It's been a long time."  Portal 2 is more than just a game, Portal 2 is a work of art. One of the most beautifuly crafted games mankind will ever play, and for many reasons. The level design is perfect, character design perfect, puzzles and gameplay perfect, and a perfect story, one that in it's own unique way will bring you joy, make you sad and scare the hell out of you all at the same time.


I do not wish to spoil the story for you becuase it's best to enter the lab blind. So all i will tell you is you play as Chell the protagonist from Portal 1 and must use the Portal Gun to explore the mind-bending mysteries of Aperture once again, but with more heartstopping, spine chilling secrets than ever before. By manipulating the lab in ways like never before, from bending bridges made of light to Repulsion Gel launching you to newfound heights, you will lose yourself in the beauty that is Aperture. After you conquer the magnificence of Aperture as the lovely Chell move on to co-op with a friend and conquer Aperture as P-Body and Atlas, the labs newest guests, forging a bond like no other.


But no matter what you see, no matter what you here, remember one thing... think with portals... You Monster.

Que podría decir de Portal 2, una obra maestra hecha por la mano de los mismos creadores de la saga Half-Life, deberias hacerte un favor y jugarlo, no está muy caro, sobre todo en ofertas y cada segundo de juego valdrá la pena, con el carisma que tienen los personajes y el buen doblaje y con lo que pensarás en cada puzzle, ademas que tiene soporte con la workshop asi que puedes bajarte camaras de prueba hechas por la comunidad, este juego de lleva mis 10/10.

Güzel bir oyun

Dieses Spiel ist in so vielen Ebenen atemberaubend, krass,spannend, knifflig und emotional, dass es zu den legendären Spielen wie Half-Life und anderen Klassikern gehört. 
Es ist der zweite Teil der "Portal"-Reihe und erzählt die Geschichte weiter von Chell, dem Mädchen, welches die Hauptfigur ist.
Spieltechnisch ist es gut umgesetzt, die Idee, sich mit Portalen fortzubewegen ist gut umgesetzt und verleiht dem Spiel seine Individualität. Durchgehend wird es nie langeweilig, weil die Story parallel richtig fesselnd übergeben wird. Die Aussage und die philosophische Idee, die hinter dem Portaluniversum steckt, der Konflikt zwischen Menschlichkeit und KI, die pure Isolation und die pure Manipulation der Wahrnehmung ist einfach phänomenal. Ich liebe solche Spiel und Valve hat einfach ein Meisterwerk, eine Sinfonie der Spiel, einen wahren Opus geschaffen.
Meiner Meinung ist das einfach ein unerklärbares Erlebnis, was man nur durchs Spielen erleben kann. Spielt dieses Spiel und ihr werdet dieses Spiel lieben. Es gibt kein CONTRA, es ist PERFEKT. Achja, fast vergessen, the cake is a lie.

I just bought this game during the Steam summersales. It was worth the €2,-.

Portal 2 is a classic puzzle game that you need to try atleast once to experience it's core. You don't need a high-end gaming pc the run this game properly. The story is sometimes a bit funny and that's really all what I have to say about this game.

I recommend this game if you are into puzzles and want a bit of a challenge.

不能不玩的遊戲之一
故事承接前作劇情，而且今代的劇情亦較豐富有趣
了解到 Aperture Science 的歷史，以及與前作的敵人一起合作
雖然關卡上有時也會遇上卡關，但都不算太困難
而且結局也讓我吃驚，GLaDOS 太可愛了

畫質上看得出有改善，場景很有材質感
也增加了不少元素，但個人不太感興趣就是了
因為比較需要動腦筋啊

遊戲新增了合作模式，沒有朋友的我只能線上尋找同伴
雖然有點擔心會成為累贅，但結果是很歡樂的！
建議先玩單人模式知道一些元素的用法，會比較好上手
可是關卡有點多，大約需要玩半天以上
而且感覺需要合作解成就是件非常困難的事情
Как всегда идеально!!!!!!

I originally had this on the Xbox 360 when it first came out. fun as hell and a lot of hours were spent solving puzzles that wouldn't be the same without that signature GLaDos or wheatley commentary. I decided to buy both portal and portal 2 for PC just to see how different it is. And honestly I love the changes. The fact that I can play Co-op with my friends and make/play community levels makes it worth it just by itself. I love this game, totally reccomend it and lets hope portal 3 comes out soon. *nudge, nudge, wink wink, 1,2,3, PLEASE*

Portal evreni bu oyunla iyice yerine oturuyor. Başıboş bir oyun değil de Portal 1 ve Half Life evreniyle alakası olduğunu sık sık vurguluyor. GLaDOS ve yeni robot dostumuz Wheatley ile yine esprili, iğneleyici diyaloglar dinliyoruz ve bunların yanı sıra bu kez konu anlatımı daha sıkı tutulmuş. Diyalogların sıcakalığı sizi gülümsetse de oyunun dünyasını anlamaya başladığınızda garip bir ürperti duyuyorsunuz. Daha oyunun başında 9999999 gündür uykuda olan bir denek olarak uyanıyoruz. Uyandığımız yer ise ilk oyundaki mekanın yıkılmış ve hüzünlü hali -e doğal olarak, yıktık çünkü.- Oyunda GLaDOS'un ve kendimizin geçmişiyle ilgili ufak detaylar buluyoruz. Fakat elbette her zaman ufak detaylar olarak kalmaya devam ediyor. Alttan alta çok gizli, ilginç ve güzel bir hikayesi olduğunu anlıyorsunuz ama hiçbir zaman onu açık açık size söylemiyor.

Oyundaki tek kötü nokta bazı bulmaca kısımlarının çok uzun olması. Bu yüzden ilk oyundaki gibi birkaç defa değil tek sefer bitirebildim. Ama yine de oynamaya değer.
